issue.title: Cached models lose server and name information

content.raw:
Looking at [LocalCache_TEST](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/src/a6fe2f890583ae6b852b2c088dd197535a441c8e/src/LocalCache_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default), I suspect the intended directory structure is actually quite different from the one currently implemented.

Test path: `<cache location>/<server local name>/<username>/<modelname>`

Actual path: `<cache location>/models/<username>/<modelname>`

Where:

* `<cache location>` defaults to `~/.ignition/fuel`
* `<server local name>` is the `ServerConfig::LocalName` provided by the yaml file.

The test seems to be checking something different from how it actually works.
